title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Improving Learning Outcomes through Efficient Auditory Lecture Speed Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level social studies knowledge and practical experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% comprehension and 70% delayed recall accuracy in 1.5x speed auditory lecture environments.
Learners can categorize and explain concentration changes based on lecture speed into three or more levels using EEG data.
Through project-based assessment, learners design VR social studies scenarios reflecting optimal lecture speeds.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
